summary: This is a re-texture of theRoadstroker\'s Royal Elven Set.
descriptionHtml:
Royal Elven Set re-texture by CrimsonFairy

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Description
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
My first mod for Skyrim! This mod is a re-texture of theRoadstroker\'s Royal Elven Set. I absolutely LOVED the original colors of the design, but unfortunately it just didn\'t go with any of my characters. So I decided to retexture it blue and purple!

I\'m no longer making retextures for this set, so please do not request any.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Requirements
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Just the original mod [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25083/]here[/url].

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Install
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Extract files from archive into Skryim data folder. Click yes to all, and when asked if you want to overwrite file, click yes/move and replace.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Uninstall
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Go to Data/Textures/armor/theRoadstroker/ElfArmor and then delete ElfArmor_diff.dds or overwrite it with the original texture.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Credits
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Bethesda for making Skyrim.
theRoadstroker for his AMAZING work in the original mod.
Frederick Durand (Zoberraz). Producer, QA (Quality Assurance), and support.
And the Nexus creators and staff for their awesome website.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Usage
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
You are not allowed to upload this mod to any other site without my and theRoadstrokers permission. And you are not allowed to use this in any of your own mods without theRoadstrokers permission either.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Bugs
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
The texture works fine for me but if you have any problems/bugs then please let me know so that I can adress them as quickly as possible!
author: CrimsonFairy
